channel.title: How to change the tempo one step at a time
channel.description: Hello there Auxy forums! Right now, I have a bit of difficulty changing the bpm. The current system requires me to drag the bpm slider. However, the slider is quite small for such a wide range of numbers. It would be much easier if I could simply tap on the current bpm number to pull up a text/number input and type my own bpm. If the number was too high or too low, it could just throw me a blue message saying something along the lines of “Invalid bpm number! Please try again.” I’ve had the app for more than half a year at this point and still have this minor inconvenience. Thanks for reading.
